ai.harmony.ravel.analysis.security

Class SecurityOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.harmony.ravel.analysis.security.SecurityOperation

  • public class SecurityOperation
extends java.lang.Object
    A security operation consists a security primitive, a key, a set of model fields to which it applies, and a corresponding endpoint. It reduces to IR which is then compiled to the target platform.
